document.full_text: sidney crosby was never close to returning to the pittsburgh penguins for a stanley cup run, revealing on friday that the concussion-related symptoms that sidelined him since january have not gone away.
document.title: concussion symptoms stalled sidney crosby's comeback bid
lines_and_colors: sidney crosby was never close to returning to the pittsburgh penguins for a stanley cup run, revealing on friday that the concussion-related symptoms that sidelined him since january have not gone away.
